shortlist.name: Golspie (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last eight starts. No major signs of decline; reliable profile for this grade. Connections have kept the horse competitive and fit. Odds reflect strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Ribble River (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and solid form figures, including multiple wins and placings. Trainer is respected and horse is proven at this level. No evidence of needing major improvement; profile fits winnerâ€™s bracket. Odds offer fair value for current form.

shortlist.name: Cotswold Cottage
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and placed efforts this season. Form suggests horse is holding condition and connections have placed it well. Not a longshot, and odds indicate market respect. No major improvement required to contend.

shortlist.name: Monarch's Gold
shortlist.rationale: Won last start, indicating strong current form. Top connections with a progressive trainer and a reliable jockey. Odds reflect strong market support and suggest high expectations. No need for major improvement based on recent win.

shortlist.name: Night Mission (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 2.42, SBK 5/2 (clear second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Runner-up last time, showing consistency and likely to be competitive again. Market position confirms strong support. Jockey is experienced and the horse does not require significant improvement to contend.

shortlist.name: Dazzling Haze
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 5.4 exchange (market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Comes here in strong form with two wins in last three starts, showing consistency and ability to win in this grade. The Crisford stable is reliable and the odds reflect strong market support, indicating confidence from connections and punters.

shortlist.name: Lil Brother
shortlist.rationale: Recent winner with a solid profile and top jockey booking in Hollie Doyle. Consistent performer with two wins in last five starts, suggesting reliability and current fitness. Odds indicate genuine market respect.

shortlist.name: Clear Force (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Has been running well in competitive races, with a win and two other good efforts in last five. Trained by K. R. Burke, a respected yard, and the odds suggest strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Stardinia (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/2 SBK, 3.85 exchange (not an outsider, exchange price notably short)
shortlist.rationale: Recent winner and placed last time, indicating upward form. Exchange odds are notably shorter than fixed-odds, suggesting significant market support. Trainer and jockey both in good form.

shortlist.name: Poker (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Debuts for a top yard with a leading jockey booked. The market is heavily in his favour, suggesting strong confidence from connections and punters. No negative signals from the opposition and no major improvement required from rivals.

shortlist.name: Gaurdman (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Solid recent form, improving with each start. Trained by an in-form yard and partnered by a top jockey. Clear on ratings among those with experience and the only realistic threat to the favourite based on current market and form.

shortlist.name: Leadman
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer at this level with a recent win and placed efforts; top jockey booked; current odds reflect strong market confidence and value for a runner with proven form and connections.

shortlist.name: Flag Of St George (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two recent wins and placed efforts; top-class jockey in Silvestre De Sousa; odds indicate strong support and realistic winning chance based on recent form and connections.

shortlist.name: Klassleader
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win last time out, top connections, and current market leader. Recent form suggests peak condition and reliable improvement, making him the most likely winner.

shortlist.name: Sing Us A Song (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with a win two starts back and proven ability at this level. Trainer and jockey are both respected, and odds reflect strong market support. Solid chance if reproducing best form.

shortlist.name: Gentle Warrior (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in excellent form with back-to-back wins and consistent placings. Connections are in good form and odds offer reasonable value for a horse peaking at the right time.

shortlist.name: Roland Garros
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a strong second last time out, indicating readiness to win. Races for an in-form jockey and is well found in the market, suggesting confidence from connections and punters. No sign of regression in form and holds a class edge over most rivals.

shortlist.name: Alpine Stroll
shortlist.rationale: Returned to form with a win last time out, showing ability to bounce back and handle current conditions. Market support is strong, and recent improvement is notable. Connections have placed the horse well and the profile fits a repeat bid.

shortlist.name: Corsican Caper (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/2 SBK, 4.9 Exchange (solid third choice, supported on exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent profile, regularly hitting the frame and now finds a winnable opportunity. Hollie Doyle is a positive jockey booking and the horse is holding form well, suggesting a win is within reach if the leaders underperform.

shortlist.name: Coedana (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/8 SBK, 3.5 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with consistent placed efforts and a recent win, indicating peak form. Connections are in good order and the odds reflect strong market confidence. No sign of regression and form is reliable for this grade.

shortlist.name: Dancingintherain
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 2.82 exchange (joint second favourite, solid support)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with solid placed form in all recent starts. Trained by a top yard and partnered by a reliable jockey. Has not shown signs of decline and is likely to be competitive again at this level.

shortlist.name: Cecilia Star (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 2.82 exchange (joint second favourite, well respected in market)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced with a win and a recent placed effort, suggesting scope for further improvement. Top jockey booking and trainer in form. Market position indicates strong expectations.

shortlist.name: Shamardal Star
shortlist.rationale: Returned to form with a win last time out, suggesting peak fitness and improvement. Trained by Richard Fahey, a respected yard, and partnered by a capable jockey. Market support is strong, indicating confidence from connections and punters.

shortlist.name: Max Of Stars (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Latest win shows clear recent progress and ability to handle this grade. Consistent profile with a lightly-raced look this season, and current odds reflect strong market confidence. Trainer and jockey combination is in good order.

shortlist.name: Wyld Bill
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts ago and another solid effort last time suggest the horse is holding form well. Not as strong as the top two on overall profile, but current odds offer some value and the horse is proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Creative Queen (Usa)
shortlist.rationale: Represents top connections with William Haggas and James Doyle, both highly respected in UK racing. The odds indicate strong market confidence, suggesting the horse is well regarded and expected to be ready first time out. No major improvement needed given the profile and support.

shortlist.name: Vencedora (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Solid debut third, indicating ability and race fitness. Trained by Karl Burke, who is adept with juveniles and Newcastle runners. Odds are competitive, suggesting genuine market respect and a likely contender if the favourite underperforms.

shortlist.name: Beach Partee
shortlist.odds_note: 13/8 SBK, 3.45 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Returned to winning form last time out after a sequence of improving efforts, suggesting peak fitness and suitability for current conditions. Connections are in solid form and the odds reflect strong market confidence. No major improvement needed; profile is progressive and reliable.

shortlist.name: Woody Y Fernandez
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive placed efforts, indicating reliability and competitiveness at this level. Jockey and trainer combination is competent, and odds are fair for a horse knocking on the door. No evidence of needing major improvement; should be in the mix again.

shortlist.name: Livonian (Ger)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win and a second from two starts, indicating reliable recent form. Trained by Ralph Beckett, who excels with improving types, and partnered by a capable jockey. Odds reflect strong market confidence and form justifies favouritism.

shortlist.name: Wesam (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Well-bred newcomer from a top stable with a strong record at Newcastle. Jockey is reliable and connections suggest readiness. Market support is notable for a debutant, indicating stable confidence.

shortlist.name: Canopus (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Showed promise with a runner-up finish last time, suggesting improvement. Trainer is adept with progressive three-year-olds and jockey is in good recent form. Odds offer fair value for a horse proven at the track.

shortlist.name: Reenie's Dream
shortlist.odds_note: 7/4 SBK, 3.1 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive in-the-frame finishes, including a close second and third. No signs of regression, and connections are in solid form. The odds reflect strong market confidence and the profile suggests this runner is peaking at the right time.

shortlist.name: Ey Up He's A Star
shortlist.rationale: Has been running consistently well in similar company, regularly placing and not beaten far in recent starts. The form figures show reliability and the current odds indicate market respect. Connections are capable and the horse is holding form.

shortlist.name: Yafaarr (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is improving, with a fourth and third in last two starts suggesting the horse is coming to hand. Not a longshot and has shown enough to be competitive in this field. Connections are respected at this level.

shortlist.name: Missmimi
shortlist.rationale: Missmimi arrives in peak form, winning last time out and rarely running a poor race this season. She is well found in the market, suggesting strong confidence from connections and punters. Her consistency and recent win make her the most solid option among the principals.

shortlist.name: Little Mi Mi (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Little Mi Mi bounced back to form with a runner-up finish last time, indicating she is returning to her best. Her odds reflect market respect, and she is trained by a yard capable of readying winners at this level. She profiles as the main danger to the favourite.

shortlist.name: Bernalda
shortlist.rationale: Bernalda arrives in consistent form, with a recent win and multiple placed efforts indicating reliability and peak fitness. The odds are competitive, suggesting market confidence. Connections are respected and the horse does not require major improvement.

shortlist.name: Hale End (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Hale End (Ire) has shown solid consistency with several placed efforts and a recent third, indicating readiness and suitability for this level. The trainer is reliable, and the odds reflect strong market support. No major improvement needed.

shortlist.name: Ocean Odyssey (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Ocean Odyssey (Ire) is the market leader, with a recent second and a win in the last eight runs. The form is competitive, and the connections are capable. The odds indicate strong market confidence, and the horse is not an outsider.

shortlist.name: Izzari (Ger)
shortlist.rationale: Izzari (Ger) comes off a win last time out, showing ability to score at this level. The overall form is mixed but includes another win and placed efforts, suggesting the horse is in good order. Odds are competitive, and connections are capable.

shortlist.name: Elwateen (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong market support (5/2 SBK, 3.65 exchange), clear favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Won on debut and has contested higher grade races since; recent form suggests a drop in class here could suit. Trainer is in good form and jockey is reliable. Odds indicate strong confidence from market and connections.

shortlist.name: Cajole
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market (10/3 SBK, 5.8 exchange), solid support.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple placings at this level; top connections with Buick and Gosden. Recent form is reliable and suggests readiness. Market odds reflect respect for stable and horse's consistency.

shortlist.name: Never Let Go
shortlist.odds_note: Well-backed (9/2 SBK, 7 exchange), not an outsider.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and placed efforts show progressive profile. Trainer and jockey combination is effective. Form figures indicate the horse is holding its form and competitive at this level.

shortlist.name: Spirited Style
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two wins and a second from last four starts, trained by top yard and partnered by leading jockey. Recent form is strong and odds reflect clear market confidence. No evidence of needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Silent Love (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives on a hat-trick with back-to-back wins, showing clear upward trajectory. Same top stable as the favourite, and odds are solid for an improver with proven recent form. Connections and profile suggest further progress is likely.

shortlist.name: Touleen
shortlist.rationale: Unbeaten in two starts, showing progressive form and likely improvement. Top jockey William Buick is in excellent recent form. Trainer Owen Burrows is reliable with improving types. Current odds reflect strong market confidence and value for a likely winner.

shortlist.name: Zanthos (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Solid debut win followed by a respectable second, indicating consistency and ability at this level. Oisin Murphy is a top jockey with strong recent performance metrics. The Crisford team excels with progressive juveniles. Odds are competitive for a genuine contender.

shortlist.name: Opera Ballo (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Outstanding recent form with four wins from last five starts, representing a top stable and leading jockey. Odds reflect dominance but still offer value given consistency and connections. No signs of regression in form.

shortlist.name: Zeus Olympios
shortlist.rationale: Unbeaten in three starts, progressive profile, and connections in good form. Represents the main threat to the favourite, with odds still offering some value for a lightly raced improver.

shortlist.name: By The Book (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Unbeaten profile with top connections; Buick and Appleby excel at Newmarket. Recent form is flawless, suggesting high potential and readiness. Odds reflect strong market support and expectation of further improvement.

shortlist.name: Isle Of Jura
shortlist.rationale: Outstanding winning streak last season, showing consistency and progression. Trainer and jockey in good form. Odds indicate respect from market, and recent form suggests reliability at this level.

shortlist.name: Eydon (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and runner-up finish signal peak fitness and improvement. Murphy is a top jockey, and Baldingâ€™s horses often progress with age. Odds are competitive, suggesting genuine winning chance.

shortlist.name: Battle Apple
shortlist.rationale: Showed promise with a runner-up finish on debut and was not disgraced in a stronger race last time. Has race fitness, proven ability, and represents a top yard. Current odds reflect strong market confidence and form is the most solid among the field.

shortlist.name: Beccadelli
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market; 15/4 SBK, 5.9 exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Debut fourth for a leading stable with a top jockey. Expected to improve for the run, and connections are highly respected at this venue. Market support is notable and form is competitive for this grade.

shortlist.name: Man Of La Mancha
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with a recent win and multiple placings, indicating reliability and current form. Trained by Ralph Beckett, who is strong with improving handicappers, and partnered by Rossa Ryan. Odds reflect strong market support without being prohibitive.

shortlist.name: Mezcala
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two runner-up finishes and a win in last four starts. Tom Marquand is a notable jockey booking. Recent form suggests the horse is still improving and competitive at this level.

shortlist.name: Coco Mademoiselle (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite at 1.39 on exchange; clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes a win and a solid reappearance; trained by Dan Skelton and ridden by Harry Skelton, both highly respected in UK jumps racing. The horse has shown consistency and class at this level, and the odds reflect strong confidence from the market. No signs of decline in recent runs, and connections are in excellent form.

shortlist.name: Secret Trix
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice at 3.4 on exchange; clear next best.
shortlist.rationale: Form is mixed but includes placed efforts and a win last season. Sean Bowen is a top jockey and Olly Murphy is a capable trainer. The horse is not an outsider and has shown enough ability to be competitive if the favourite underperforms. Recent runs suggest fitness and readiness, and the odds indicate genuine market respect.

shortlist.name: Rocks Up Late (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 2/1 SBK, 3.35 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Has won 4 of last 5 completed starts, showing peak form this summer. Forgive the pulled-up run two starts back (possible bounce factor), but rebounded immediately with another win. Ben Pauling yard in good form, and Ben Jones is a reliable jockey. Proven at this level and trip.

shortlist.name: Superstylin (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 5.5 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer last season, regularly in the frame at this level. Trainer and jockey combination is effective. Returns from a break but has run well fresh before. Market respect and reliable profile make him a strong contender if fit.

shortlist.name: Alshadhian (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form figures show a win and two places from last three starts, indicating improvement and current fitness. Yard is in form and the horse is holding condition well. Should be competitive again at this level.

shortlist.name: Traveling Soldier (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 2/1 SBK, 2.8 exchange (clear favourite, solid market support)
shortlist.rationale: Comes here in excellent form, having finished first or second in last four starts. Proven consistency at this level, top connections (Bowen/Murphy), and current odds reflect strong market confidence. No sign of regression in recent runs.

shortlist.name: Independent Jimmy
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile, breaking through for a win last time after a string of placed efforts. Reliable trainer, and form suggests further improvement is possible. Market position confirms expectations of another bold run.

shortlist.name: Dream Diamond (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 7/2 SBK, 5.2 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a win last time out and multiple placings this season. Market support is strong, indicating confidence. Connections are in good order and the horse is proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Service Minimum (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two wins and a second from last three starts. Top trainer/jockey combination adds confidence. Form is solid and the horse is still improving.

shortlist.name: Stumps Or Slips (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives on a four-race winning streak, showing clear upward trajectory. Trainer and jockey are both in strong form. Market position reflects genuine winning claims.

shortlist.name: Ice In The Veins (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/8 SBK, 2.72 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win and two placed efforts from last three starts, representing top connections (Skelton yard excels at Worcester). Recent form is reliable and the horse is likely to be at peak fitness. Odds reflect strong chance and market confidence.

shortlist.name: Sir Hobnob
shortlist.odds_note: 5/2 SBK, 3.65 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced with a win and a promising seasonal debut. Trained by a respected team and ridden by a top jockey. Form suggests scope for further improvement and odds indicate clear market respect.

shortlist.name: I'm A Starman
shortlist.odds_note: 3/1 SBK, 4.4 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with three consecutive wins before a respectable fifth last time; strong recent form and holding condition. Top jockey booking and market support confirm expectations.

shortlist.name: Supreme Yeats (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 6 exchange (solid second-favorite, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple recent placings and a win this season. Top connections (Skelton team) and reliable form make him a strong contender.

shortlist.name: Sam's Amour
shortlist.rationale: Two wins last season and a solid reappearance run. Recent form figures suggest fitness and ability to compete at this level. Odds indicate market respect.

shortlist.name: High Court Judge (Usa)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/8 SBK, 3.55 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive recent form with a win and a close second in last two starts. Connections are in good order and the horse is fit and consistent, matching key criteria for a likely winner at this level. Odds reflect strong market confidence and value for a runner with proven ability over similar conditions.

shortlist.name: Turpin Gold
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is excellent, with two wins and a second from last three starts, indicating peak fitness and reliability. Trainer Tom Lacey is respected for placing horses well at this level. Odds are competitive and suggest genuine winning claims without being overbet.

shortlist.name: Best Suggestion (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong market support (5/2 SBK, 4.0 exchange); clear favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, suggesting reliability and readiness. Connections are solid, and current odds indicate strong market confidence. No signs of decline in form and should be competitive at this level.

shortlist.name: Heaven's Wish (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market (15/2 SBK, 3.9 exchange); value against favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes a fourth place, indicating ability to compete. Odds are notably shorter on exchange, suggesting professional support. Connections are capable and the horse is not exposed, with potential for improvement without needing a major leap.

shortlist.name: Carrigans Grove (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple wins and placings, indicating peak condition. Connections are reliable and the odds reflect strong market confidence. No signs of decline in performance, making this runner the most solid on current evidence.

shortlist.name: Lismacbryan Hill (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Well-backed at 6/1 (SBK), 3.5 (exchange) â€“ notably strong on exchange
shortlist.rationale: Recent win signals improvement and market support is robust, especially on the exchange. Trainer is in form and the horse appears to be progressing rather than regressing, making this a value contender.

shortlist.name: Rappell (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with form suggesting reliability at this level. While not winning recently, the horse is regularly in contention and the odds indicate market respect. Connections are capable and the horse does not require major improvement.

shortlist.name: Yellowstone Lake (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Strong market support and solid recent form, finishing 2nd and 4th in two starts. Represents a top yard with a high strike rate at Dundalk. The form figures suggest ability and readiness, and the odds indicate strong confidence from the market.

shortlist.name: Institute (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Debutant from the Aidan O'Brien stable, which has an outstanding record with newcomers at Dundalk. The booking of W. M. Lordan is notable, and the market position suggests strong stable confidence despite lack of public form.

shortlist.name: Real Encounter (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 6/1 (SBK), 4.2 (exchange) â€“ solidly backed, not an outsider
shortlist.rationale: Respectable debut effort finishing 4th, likely to improve for that experience. Trained by a leading yard and partnered by a top jockey. The odds reflect realistic winning potential without being overbet.

shortlist.name: The Bog Bank (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and consistent form at this level; proven ability to handle Dundalk and competitive fields. Jockey and trainer have solid local records. Odds indicate strong market support and value.

shortlist.name: Pinball Wizard (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Placed last time out and has shown ability to compete in similar company. Trainer is respected at Dundalk and the odds suggest genuine winning chance without being overbet.

shortlist.name: Ms Olivia (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form, including a close second two starts back. Connections are reliable and the odds offer fair value for a runner with proven ability at the course.

shortlist.name: Sierra De Gredos
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is outstanding, with two wins in last four starts and consistent top-three finishes. Connections are reliable, and odds reflect strong market support. No signs of decline in form, making this runner the most solid on current evidence.

shortlist.name: Punk Poet (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form, including a close second and third in last two starts, indicating readiness to win. Trainer and jockey are experienced at Dundalk, and odds suggest strong market confidence. No major improvement needed, just a repeat of recent efforts.

shortlist.name: Amanirenas (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Returned to winning form last time out, showing ability to bounce back. Jockey is in good form and connections are capable. Odds have shortened significantly on exchange, indicating market support and potential for further improvement.

shortlist.name: Madam Celeste (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is progressive with a win and a close second in last three starts, indicating peak condition. Trainer Lyons is reliable at Dundalk and the jockey booking is positive. Odds reflect strong market confidence and value for a runner with proven consistency.

shortlist.name: You Got To Me
shortlist.rationale: Has multiple wins in recent form and returns after a needed run. Connections are in form and the horse has shown ability at this level. Odds are short, indicating strong market expectation and justified by prior winning form.

shortlist.name: Phantom Flight
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with two wins and several placed efforts in last six starts. Jockey Heffernan is a notable booking and the horse has shown adaptability to Dundalk's surface. Odds are competitive for a runner with proven class and reliability.

shortlist.name: Aftermath (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced with a win and placed efforts in last three starts before a seasonal return. Trained by Aidan O'Brien and ridden by Lordan, both highly respected. Market odds suggest expectation of improvement and class edge.

shortlist.name: Quickshot (Usa)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong market support (10/3 SBK, 3.15 exchange), clear favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and runner-up finish indicate peak form; progressive profile with top jockey booking. Connections in good order and odds reflect strong chance.

shortlist.name: Sacred Oath (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second favourite (7/2 SBK, 6 exchange), respected yard.
shortlist.rationale: Solid win two starts back and consistent form for a leading trainer. Recent runs competitive at this level; odds offer fair value for proven ability.

shortlist.name: Benavente
shortlist.rationale: Latest win signals improvement; form suggests readiness to compete again. Market support and recent success make this runner a credible threat.

shortlist.name: Chopsticks (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a last-time-out win. Trained by a respected local handler and partnered by a reliable jockey. Current odds reflect strong market support and suggest genuine winning chance.

shortlist.name: Waystar (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Stablemate to the favourite, Waystar has shown competitive form this season including a win and a recent runner-up effort. Trainer in form and odds indicate market respect. Connections and profile suggest a strong chance if reproducing best.

shortlist.name: Nadia's Boy (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Won on debut, representing top connections (Mullins/Townend). The form is progressive and the odds reflect strong market support. No signs of needing major improvement and likely to be well-prepared for this assignment.

shortlist.name: Frankie John (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Latest win signals peak form and the horse has shown consistent improvement. Connections are reliable and the odds indicate strong market confidence. Recent victory suggests readiness and no major improvement required.

shortlist.name: Wholelotofbusiness (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 5.1 exchange (third choice, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placed form, regularly finishing in the frame. Odds are competitive and connections are capable. While not as progressive as the top two, the horse is reliable and does not require major improvement to contend.

shortlist.name: Flemens Intrest (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Returned from a break last season with back-to-back wins, suggesting ability and readiness when fresh. The form figures indicate a lightly raced profile with upside, and current odds reflect strong market support. Connections are capable and the jockey is experienced in these races.
shortlist.confidence: High â€“ proven recent winning form and market strength.

shortlist.name: Half A Chance (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 (SBK), 6.4 (Exchange) â€“ solidly in the top tier of the market
shortlist.rationale: Recent runner-up effort signals a return to form after a quiet spell, and the overall profile shows ability at this level. Jockey is one of the leading amateurs, and the trainer is respected in handicaps. Odds indicate strong market respect.
shortlist.confidence: High â€“ recent form and connections are positives.

shortlist.name: Give Him A Chance (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 (SBK), 7.4 (Exchange) â€“ well supported, not an outsider
shortlist.rationale: Has won two of last three starts, including a recent win, showing clear improvement and ability to win in this grade. Trainer is in form and the horse is clearly thriving. Odds are competitive for a last-time-out winner.
shortlist.confidence: High â€“ progressive profile and recent winning form.

shortlist.name: Mount Ferns (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Strong market support and leading odds. Recent form includes a win and a placed effort in last six starts, with a top jockey booked. Connections are in form and the horse has shown ability at this level. No major negatives in profile.

shortlist.name: Inchiquin Maid (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two runner-up finishes in last four starts. Odds indicate respect from the market. Trainer is capable in this grade and the horse has proven stamina and reliability.

shortlist.name: Regards To Rose (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/2 SBK, 4.2 exchange (noted market support on exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with three top-five finishes in last four runs. Exchange odds are notably shorter than fixed-odds, suggesting smart money. Connections are respected and the horse is holding form.

shortlist.name: Serienmond (Ger)
shortlist.rationale: Returned from a break to win last time out, showing clear improvement and ability to handle current conditions. Trainer Cromwell is in strong form and the horseâ€™s profile suggests further progress is likely. Odds are fair for a last-time winner with upside.

shortlist.name: Spy
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form, culminating in a win last time out. Trainer Charles Byrnes is adept at placing his runners and the horse has proven reliability at this level. Market support is notable and suggests confidence.

shortlist.name: Bowensonfire (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Very solid profile with multiple wins and placings this season. Jockey Kennedy and trainer Elliott are a top combination. The horseâ€™s exchange price is notably shorter than fixed odds, indicating significant market respect and possible value.

shortlist.name: Casheldale Lad (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two wins from last four starts and placed on latest run. Represents leading connections and is likely to be well-prepared for this target. Odds reflect strong chance.

shortlist.name: Fire Coral
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 3.4, SBK 11/2 (solid market support, near favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with back-to-back wins, suggesting improvement and fitness. Connections are reliable, and odds indicate strong market confidence. Recent form is the best in the field, with no sign of regression.

shortlist.name: Jetaway Nana (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a win last time out, indicating readiness and ability at this level. Trainer has a good record with similar types, and odds reflect genuine winning chance.

shortlist.name: Nothing Hectic (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and solid placed efforts show progressive profile. Connections have landed similar contests, and odds offer value given the form trajectory.

shortlist.name: A Nod To Getaway (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Comes here in peak form, winning last time out and showing consistent placed efforts prior. Odds indicate strong market confidence and recent win suggests readiness. Connections are in good order.

shortlist.name: Person Of Interest (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Latest win signals improvement and ability to handle current conditions. Has been running consistently well in recent starts and is well found in the market.

shortlist.name: Celestial Tune (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/5 SBK, 3.25 exchange (clear market leader, strong support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a recent second and a fourth, showing consistency and improvement. Market support is strong, and the connections are respected. No need for major improvement to win here.

shortlist.name: Are You Around (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Debut third for top connections (Mullins/Townend) suggests plenty of scope for improvement. Market position is strong, and the stable excels in these events. Should be competitive without needing a big leap forward.

shortlist.name: Lennon Grove (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 3.1 exchange (noted exchange strength, respected connections)
shortlist.rationale: No public form but significant market support on the exchange and a top amateur jockey booked. Trainer is adept with bumper types, and the market confidence suggests readiness.

shortlist.name: Sorrentino (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 3/1 SBK, 3.9 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two runner-up finishes, indicating reliability and readiness to win. Trained by Willie Mullins, a top yard, and partnered by a capable amateur. Market support is strong, suggesting confidence from connections and punters.

shortlist.name: Lark In The Mornin (Ger)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win and a third from last two starts, representing a top stable. Recent form figures suggest improvement and ability to compete at this level. Odds indicate strong market respect.

shortlist.name: Randomized (Usa)
shortlist.odds_note: Expected to be a market leader based on top connections and recent profile.
shortlist.rationale: Trained by Chad Brown, a leading US trainer, and ridden by Flavien Prat, one of the most reliable jockeys in New York. This combination is highly successful at Aqueduct. Even without published recent form, the connections alone suggest strong intent and readiness for this spot. Market support is likely, and this profile rarely represents a longshot.

shortlist.name: Margie's Intention (Usa)
shortlist.odds_note: Should be prominent in the betting given the Cox/Franco partnership.
shortlist.rationale: Brad Cox is a top-tier trainer with a high strike rate at Aqueduct, and Manuel Franco is a leading local jockey. Horses from this barn are typically well-prepared and attract market support. Even without visible form, the connections and likely odds profile make this runner a strong contender.

shortlist.name: Ascalon Dancer (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 1.81 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Strong market support suggests confidence from connections and punters. S'manga Khumalo is a top jockey and G. van Zyl (Jnr) is a respected trainer. Lack of recent form data is a minor concern, but the odds imply readiness and ability.

shortlist.name: Belligerent (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form in the frame, indicating reliability and fitness. Rachel Venniker is a capable jockey and the stable is in form. Market support matches the leading contender, suggesting strong expectations.

shortlist.name: Greatest Hit (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Well-supported in the market, indicating positive expectations. Sean Veale is a solid jockey booking. Although lacking published recent form, the odds suggest the horse is expected to be competitive.

shortlist.name: Carnarvon (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, top jockey booking, and strong market support. Has not shown decline and remains reliable at this level.

shortlist.name: Targaryen Knight (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with recent improvement, placed last time and lightly raced. Trainer in form and odds indicate strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Rejuvenate (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 1.24 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, top jockey booking, and strong market support indicate reliability and readiness. Connections are in good order and the horse is holding form at the right time.

shortlist.name: Miss Twinkle (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with solid recent efforts, lightly raced and open to further improvement. Trainer and jockey combination is respected locally, and odds reflect strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Red Lhasa (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Third in the market at 2.62 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Recent runner-up finish signals readiness to win, and top jockey booking adds further appeal. Consistent profile and competitive odds make this runner a logical inclusion.

shortlist.name: Flying Reign Storm (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Joint-favourite at 2.72 on exchange, indicating strong market support.
shortlist.rationale: Comes in off a win and has shown progressive, consistent form this season. Recent figures include multiple top finishes and a last-time-out victory, suggesting peak condition. Jockey/trainer combination is reliable and the market confidence is notable.

shortlist.name: Spring Kiss (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Joint-favourite at 2.72 on exchange, strong market position.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with solid recent form in competitive company. While not a last-time winner, has been holding form well and is proven at this level. Connections are respected and odds reflect strong expectations.

shortlist.name: Sally Port (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice at 3.15 on exchange, clear support behind the favourites.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win last time out and improving figures. Lightly raced and open to further progress. Connections are capable and the market has responded positively to her upward trajectory.

shortlist.name: Rani Tarabai (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive recent form with two wins in last four starts, including a win last time out. Top local jockey and trainer combination. Consistent improvement and proven ability at this level.

shortlist.name: Radu (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with solid recent efforts, regularly finishing close up. Reliable connections and well supported in the market. Has the form to be competitive and is holding condition.

shortlist.name: Greenhouse (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent in-the-frame finishes and represents a top stable. Recent form suggests readiness to win, and odds indicate strong market support. Connections are respected at this venue.

shortlist.name: Blazing Light (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistently running in the frame with multiple recent fourths and thirds, indicating reliability at this level. Market support is strong, and connections are solid. No need for major improvement to win in this field.

shortlist.name: Mohandas (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent third and eighth suggest competitive ability and consistency. Trainer and jockey are respected locally. Odds reflect strong market confidence and form is solid for this grade.

shortlist.name: Global Movement (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Regularly finishing in the top half of the field, including a recent second and fourth. Form is reliable and odds are competitive, suggesting a strong chance without needing significant improvement.

shortlist.name: Thambi (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent second and fourth show upward trajectory and ability to compete at this level. Market support is notable and form is trending positively.

shortlist.name: Continentalexpress (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 2.08 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Comes off a win last time out, indicating peak form. Consistent recent efforts and now faces similar company. Top connections and strong market support reinforce confidence.

shortlist.name: Dancing On A Cloud (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Stablemate to the favorite, has placed and won recently. Reliable trainer/jockey combo and solid market position. Should be competitive if reproducing best form.

shortlist.name: Santiago's Pride (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Very consistent profile with a win and two seconds in last three starts. Proven ability to compete at this level and holding form well.

shortlist.name: Infinity Edge (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Current exchange odds 2.72, clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is strong with a win and a third in last three starts, indicating consistent competitiveness at this level. Trainer M. D. Miller is well-regarded locally, and the jockey booking is solid. No signs of decline; profile fits a reliable contender with peak form.

shortlist.name: She's A Machine (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and consistent finishes in the frame suggest she is holding form well. Muzi Yeni is a top jockey in South Africa, adding confidence. Connections are reliable and the odds reflect strong market support.

shortlist.name: Sovereign Grant (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with multiple seconds and a recent runner-up finish, indicating readiness to win. S'manga Khumalo is an elite jockey, and the Miller stable is in form. No major improvement needed; reliable profile for this grade.

shortlist.name: Imposing (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Comes off a win last time out, showing ability to peak at the right time. Has a reliable top jockey and trainer combination. Consistent recent form and odds reflect strong market support.

shortlist.name: The Shepherd (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Solid overall record with multiple wins and placed efforts. Recent form is competitive and connections are respected locally. Odds indicate genuine winning chance.

shortlist.name: Pibe De Oro (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 1.45 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, suggesting reliability and fitness. The horse has been knocking on the door and is strongly supported in the market, indicating both public and professional confidence. No signs of decline in recent runs.

shortlist.name: Captain Clever (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Solid connections and competitive odds. While recent form is less consistent than the favorite, the horse is not an outsider and has shown ability to place. The market respect and capable jockey/trainer combination warrant inclusion.

shortlist.name: Amanatto (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, now dropping in grade and partnered by the top local jockey. Trainer is highly respected at Fairview. Odds reflect strong market confidence and form is reliable for this level.

shortlist.name: Genovefa (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Solid form profile with several competitive runs in similar company. Jockey is in good recent form and trainer has a strong local record. Odds offer fair value given consistency and connections.

shortlist.name: Royal Mermaid (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes multiple placings and a competitive last run. Trainer and jockey combination is proven at this venue. Odds are slightly above the top two but still indicate market respect.

shortlist.name: Silva City (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple wins and placings, trained by a top local trainer, and ridden by the leading jockey in the region. The odds reflect strong market confidence and the horse's proven ability at this level.

shortlist.name: Swiss Walt (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with several recent placings and a win, indicating reliability. The odds suggest the market expects a strong run, and the horse has shown the ability to compete at this grade.

shortlist.name: Roll Of The Dice (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in top form with three wins and a third from last four starts, indicating peak condition. Connections are strong and the jockey is reliable. Odds reflect clear market confidence and recent performance supports favoritism.

shortlist.name: Few Dollars More (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last six runs. Trainer and jockey combination is respected locally. Odds offer reasonable value for a runner with proven reliability and competitive form.

shortlist.name: Home Reef (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and two placings from last three starts suggest marked improvement and fitness. Same trainer as Few Dollars More, indicating stable strength. Odds are competitive for a horse on the upgrade.

shortlist.name: Wishes And Dreams (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Joint-favourite at 1.24 on exchange, indicating strong market confidence.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive recent form with a win and a second in last three starts, suggesting peak condition. Top local jockey and trainer combination further boosts confidence. No signs of decline and well supported in the market.

shortlist.name: Chroniclesofnania (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice at 2.12 on exchange, clear market respect.
shortlist.rationale: Latest run was a win, indicating upward trajectory and fitness. Consistent recent form and proven ability to handle local conditions. Connections are reliable and odds offer reasonable value for a likely contender.

shortlist.name: Coastal Path (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and two wins in last eight starts. Top local trainer and leading jockey combination. Reliable at this level and trip.

shortlist.name: Ready (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Solid win and place record in recent runs, showing versatility and competitiveness. Trainer and jockey both in good form locally. Profile fits race conditions.

shortlist.name: Mercantour (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Outstanding recent form with multiple wins and only one finish outside the top three in last eight runs. Top local jockey and trainer combination. Odds reflect strong market confidence and form is reliable, with no sign of decline.

shortlist.name: Guy Gibson (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with several seconds and thirds in recent starts. Same top stable as the favourite, suggesting strong yard form. Odds indicate clear respect from the market and recent form is solid, though not as prolific as stablemate.

shortlist.name: Usa's Hope (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Third in market at 3.15 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Has won twice in last six starts and remains competitive at this level. Recent form is slightly less consistent but still features multiple placings. Connections are respected and odds suggest genuine contender status.

shortlist.name: King's Sailor (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a solid placing last time out. Top local jockey and trainer combination. Odds reflect strong market support and suggest peak fitness.

shortlist.name: Thunder Master (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent with a string of runner-up finishes, indicating readiness to win. Trainer in good form and jockey experienced at this venue. Market respects chances.

shortlist.name: Prince Antonio (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and top South African jockey booked. Trainer has strong Fairview record. Form and connections make this a leading contender.
